name: MIDI Mongoose
details:
Midi Controller PedalNew version of the popular MIDI Moose
Offers additional features despite its compact size
In addition to a 7-pin connection for an external phantom power, two independent inputs for continuous controllers are available for data exchange with other MIDI devices
With only 5 foot switches, groups with 5 or 10 preset programs can be switched over in a flash
With special page functions that allow you to set the numbers for the MIDI channel and the channel for the continuous controllers and to make a calibration
Specially manufactured, particularly smooth-running controls
Robust metal housing
Large, anti-reflective LED display
Power supply: either via phantom power, a (optionally available) 9 V alkaline battery or a separately available power supply (Tech 21 model # DC4)
Dimensions (W x D x H): 29.2 x 6.3 x 3.3 cm
